code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import{obtenerNotas}from"../services/api";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function NotasAlumno(_ref){let{id}=_ref;const[notas,setNotas]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{if(id){obtenerNotas(id).then(data=>setNotas(data));}},[id]);if(!id){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card card-notas",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Notas"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Selecciona un alumno"})]});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card card-notas",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Notas"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:notas.map((nota,i)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{className:nota.nota===-1?"nota-pendiente":"nota-ok",children:[nota.nombre,": ",nota.nota===-1?"Sin calificar":nota.nota]},i))})]});}export default NotasAlumno;
